intro.title: Who I Am
intro.description: I am a data enthusiast, constantly learning new knowledge and exploring industry tools to sharpen my skills. Outside of work, I enjoy solo trips that challenge me to step out of my comfort zone, as well as hiking and beginner-level skiing. Sometimes, I like to slow down with a good book‚Äîbalancing curiosity for both data and life..

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Welcome to my project portfolio! Here you‚Äôll find a selection of my work across Azure, DBT, Power BI, and Machine Learning. These projects reflect my passion for data ‚Äî from building scalable pipelines in the cloud, to transforming raw data into reporting-ready models, to creating intuitive dashboards that drive decision-making..
